info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 713 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles southeast of Dillon to 14 miles northeast of Lima. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Ennis, Alder, Jeffers and Cameron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
